MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the LL49 postcode areas of Porthmadog , affecting a number of properties in the local area.  We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  10:57 AM.  In order to complete repairs, engineers on site will need to isolate the power to other properties to make repairs to our overhead network equipment near to Beudy Fron Oleu and we expect the power to be restored by 5 PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:28 PM on 30th October 2020..
